weka.classifiers.evaluation

Class AggregateableEvaluationWithPriors

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.evaluation.Evaluation
      • weka.classifiers.evaluation.AggregateableEvaluation
        • weka.classifiers.evaluation.AggregateableEvaluationWithPriors
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Aggregateable<Evaluation>, RevisionHandler, Summarizable

    public class AggregateableEvaluationWithPriors
extends AggregateableEvaluation
    A version of AggregateableEvaluation that allows priors to be provided (rather than being computed from the training data).
    Version:
    $Revision: 11274 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • setPriors

        public void setPriors(double[] priors,
             double count)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the priors to use. In the case of classification it is the count of each class value; in the case of regression it is the sum of the target.
        Parameters:
        priors - the priors to use
        count - the number of observations the priors were computed from
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs

      • prunePredictions

        public void prunePredictions(double retain,
                    long seed)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Randomly downsample the predictions
        Parameters:
        retain - the fraction of the predictions to retain
        seed - the random seed to use
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - if a problem occurs
